creator: davidsk

content: There is an addon that i think will handle the address book. It is at https://services.addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/outlook-address-book-enabler/ There is no Thunderbird tool to convert PST files to mbox, but there are several third-party tools that do that. I did locate this URL (developed by another company so I can't comment on the details) but it does explain several options and may be helpful to you: https://www.syscurve.com/blog/how-to-import-outlook-to-thunderbird.html
creator: davidsk

content:
A quando risale l'ultimo backup? Inoltre, Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)

Per l'anteprima premi il tasto F8
creator: @next

content:
As you surmise, this is not normal.

Does this reproduce if you have started Thunderbird in https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird ?

If yes, what add-ons do you have installed?
creator: wsmwk

content: Sometimes thunderbird does create a new profile, but the old one should still be there. Try this - click help>troubleshootinginformation - scroll down to 'profiles' and click 'about:profiles' - see if your prior account is listed and click the 'launch' button to activate it
creator: davidsk

content:
Puzzling, as line wrap is a default. Does it worh with set to body text? This next suggestion may not work, but worth a try: - click settings>general and scroll to the bottom where there is a link to config editor - change mailnews.wraplength to 0 (zero) to make composed text messages wrap to the window width. save and close

The default is to wrap at line 72, but setting to zero is intended to wrap regardless of window size. Let us know.
creator: davidsk

content: Please post screenshot of smtp server settings pane and also of incoming server settiings pane. Do you have more than one account with the same email provider? Relay error often indicates that sending email id does not match incoming email id. Please also post complete text of error message. thank you
creator: davidsk

content: I encourage you to look in the profiles as that is the only place that has the answer. Locate the folder with the high usage. It's probably in imapmail\<imapaccount> folder. There may be other files there, such as detritus of failed compactions that can be quickly deleted. Post a screenshot of the contents of the large folder to get suggestions.
creator: davidsk
